WHO:  The Klondike Derby is currently open to Scouts BSA, Venturing and Sea
data.text:
Come join us at the

Klondike Derby 2024

WHO: The Klondike Derby is currently open to Scouts BSA, Venturing and Sea Scouting youth.

WHAT: The Klondike Derby is the premier snow and winter camporee offered in the Transatlantic Council. We will again be hosted at the amazing Kandersteg International Scout Centre, located deep in the heart of the Swiss Alps.

WHEN: 12-15 January 2024 (Martin Luther King Holiday Weekend)

WHERE: Kandersteg International Scout Centre, Wagetiweg 7, 3718 Kandersteg, Switzerland

This year's theme is "The Land of the Yeti"

On Saturday, we host a fun, robin-round style competition between Patrols. Scouts compete in a variety of scout-skill inspired challenges to earn gold nuggets to win the Klondike Derby Trophy. We have a fantastic winter campfire where Patrols/Troops perform their best skits and songs.

On Sunday, Unit Leaders have the opportunity to take their Scouts on winter sports activities. Many options are available and can be arranged through the KISC team. The guided and self-guided activities are outlined in the Klondike Derby Guide and available on the KISC website.

The Klondike Derby has something for everyone and is flexible to what you can accommodate. Are you only available for Saturday? - Then just come for the day. Do you have Monday off for the MLK Holiday? - Why not stay and enjoy the mountains for a little while longer with our 3-Night Option?

Please read the Klondike Derby 2024 Event Guide thoroughly. It includes a great deal of important and timely information for Leaders and Scouts participating in the Klondike Derby.

We have enabled the use of Parent Portal. This allows the initial registration contact to provide unit parents with access to just their Scout's part of the registration, to make payments and complete data entry. Here is how it works:

Start by clicking the Use Parent Portal checkbox.

Print parent login credentials using one of the following two buttons.

Give parents one login credential for each of their participants (including themselves if they're one of the participants).

Parents use these credentials to make payments and update data entry fields such as name, rank, dietary requirements, etc.

Have any questions? Concerns? Get in touch with us at klondike@tac-bsa.org

@klondikeTAC @tacscouts

Parent Portal

We have enabled the use of Parent Portal. This allows the initial registration contact to provide unit parents with access to just their Scout's part of the registration, to make payments and complete data entry. Here is how it works:

Start by clicking the Use Parent Portal checkbox.

Print parent login credentials using one of the following two buttons.

Give parents one login credential for each of their participants (including themselves if they're one of the participants).

Parents use these credentials to make payments and update data entry fields such as name, rank, dietary requirements, etc.

Please see all attachments on this registration page, including the Leader Guide.

Costs

Options 2024 Fees 3-Night option $240 2-Night option $205 Saturday-only option $60
